ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor looked up at Liono and smiled weakly, he was saving her! She tried to get up and managed to do so, she stands there and looks at Inferno.*  No!

* Iron Raptor looked up at Liono and smiled weakly, he was saving her!
She tried to get up and managed to do so, she stands there and looks at 
Inferno.*

" No! I'm...staying here to fight with...you, Liono!"

* Then she steadied herself and growled at Inferno. There was no way in Hell 
she was going to let another bot fight alone!
She stood ready but her onboard computers were beginning to go offline one 
by one. She had to go back down to one knee but she looked back up to Liono 
and put a weak hand on his arm.*

" I'll... stay!"

* Iron Raptor knew that it was almost like suicide but she would stay and 
help her commander, she would prove to him that his followers could fight 
and win! She took a few deep breaths and got to her feet, she let go of 
Liono's arm and stood straight and true. She wouldn't let him fight alone!
Iron Raptor pulled out a laser splatter gun and aimed it at Inferno, she 
pulled the trigger!*
